# Cloud Provisioning

Main repository for Cloud Native's Cloud Formation configuration and tooling.

## Requirements

* Python 2.7
* virtualenvwrapper

## Install

1. Install [virtualenvwrapper](http://virtualenvwrapper.readthedocs.org/en/latest/)
2. Create a virtualenv `$ mkvirtualenv cloud-provisioning`
3. Install library and requirements `pip install -e .`
4. Run the tests `python setup.py test`

## CLI examples
##### Base Stack (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d update base -n platdev -s base -r us-west-2 -a "{cidr_id: 0}" -p "{KeyPairName: root}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### Single Stack (salt) (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create singlestack -n platdev -e qa1 -s ss -r us-west-2 -a "{parent_stack: ['vpc', 'reactorSNS', 'iam'], salt_master_hostname: sara-salt.moolbdev.com, domains:{default: {public_hosted_zone_id: Z1BG2WKA3A78B8, records: [bhbo, batch, medica, bcbsmn]}}, databag_secret: databag_secret}" -p "{InstanceType: r3.large, Tenancy: dedicated, KeyPairName: root, RootVolumeSize: 20}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### Tools Stack (salt) (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create tools -n platdev -e psi -s tools -r us-west-2 -a "{parent_stack: ['base']}" -p "{SecretKey: 1234, HostedZone: moolbdev.com, KeyPairName: root}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### Discovery Stack (consul, nginx) (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create discovery -n platdev -e psi -s discovery -r us-west-2 -a "{parent_stack: ['base']}" -p "{KeyPairName: root}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### Elasticache Stack (Elasticache) (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create elasticache -n PSI -e psi -s services -r us-east-1 -a "{cidr_id: 22}" -p "{NumCacheNodes: 2,CacheNodeType: 'cache.m1.small',TomcatServersVpcId: vpc-e1b13989,TomcatServersVpcCidr: 10.30.0.0/16,CloudWatchAlarmSNSTopicARN: 'arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:448752879845:CloudWatchAlarm'}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### SNS Stack (SNS Topic) (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create sns -n platdev -e psi -s sns -r us-west-2 -p "{TopicName: CloudWatchAlarm,Protocol: https,Endpoint: 'https://events.pagerduty.com/adapter/cloudwatch_sns/v1/4df9asdjbajdjasbdkjasbdjhkas'}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### Elasticsearch stack (Elasticsearch) (create/update) example

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create elasticsearch -n QA -e psi -s elasticsearch -r us-east-1 -p "{KeyName: QA-SSH, VPCID: vpc-e1b13989, SubnetID: subnet-ddcaccb0}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### SugarCRM RDS

```bin/carina_exec.py -d create sugarcrm -n prod -s sugarcrm -r us-east-1 -p "{MultiAZ: true, MasterUserPassword: dummypassword, VPCSecurityGroups: sg-1e96d27b, SubnetIds: 'subnet-c5edb9a8,subnet-66edb90b,subnet-43eeba2e,subnet-73edb91e,subnet-d3eebabe', CloudWatchAlarmSNSTopicARN: 'arn:aws:sns:us-east-1:269892434371:CloudWatchAlarm' }" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

##### Salt Master

QA - ```bin/carina_exec.py -d create salt -n qa -s salt -r us-east-1 -a "{cidr_id: 66}" -p "{InstanceType: t2.medium, Tenancy: dedicated, SaltBloomaccountGitBranch: feature/salt-carina, SaltBloomaccountGitFork: saravanakumar-periyasamy}" -b bloom-dev-carina-template -w```

PROD - ```carina -d update salt -n prod -s salt -r us-west-1 -a "{cidr_id: 166}" -p "{InstanceType: t2.medium, Tenancy: dedicated, SaltBloomaccountGitBranch: 1.1.1, KeyName: prod-us-west-1-proxy, EnvType: prod}" -b bloom-prod-carina-template -w```





## How to Release?

#### Pre-requisites

Install zest.releaser - https://pypi.python.org/pypi/zest.releaser using pip

```pip install zest.releaser```

Setup the ~/.pypirc as below

    [distutils]
    index-servers = pypicloud
    
    [pypicloud]
    repository: http://pypi.moolb.com/pypi/
    username: admin
    password: <<in LastPass under "Shared-Platform/Dev" folder>>


#### Distributing the dev version

Navigate to your cloud-provisioning repo and use the following command to upload the dev version of package

```python setup.py sdist upload -r pypicloud```

#### Distributing the release version

Do a manual build from [cloud-provisioning-release](https://jenkins-build.moolb.com/job/cloud-provisioning-release/) jenkins job

This job does the following 

* Checkout the master branch from bloomhealth ```git clone git@github.com:bloomhealth/cloud-provisioning.git```
* Issues the command ```fullrelease --no-input -v``` to
    1. remove the .dev from the version number in setup.py
    2. creates a tag with the version number
    4. create the package and upload it to http://pypi.moolb.com/pypi/
    5. increments the version number to next development version.

#### Installing Carina using pip

```pip install -i http://admin:<<password in lastpass>>@pypi.moolb.com/pypi/ carina==1.1.19 --trusted-host=pypi.moolb.com```
